Da'awar Ajiye Duniya Ladan yau da kullun (ana buƙatar tantancewa)

Wannan umarnin zai karɓi ladan ku na yau da kullun, idan akwai. Don amfani da wannan umarnin, kuna buƙatar Fortnite: Ajiye Duniya akan asusun da zakuyi da'awar dashi. Dole ne a tabbatar da ku don amfani da wannan umarni.

ha.devauth.view.button.auth.withsession: **You haven&apos ;t saitin ingantaccen na'urar akan wannan bayanan tukuna**
ha.devauth.embed.title: Sannan kawai kwafi lambar izini, danna **{0 } Tabbatar da ** Maɓallin ƙasa, kuma liƙa lambar ku a cikin faɗakarwa.
ha.devauth.embed.noprofile.descripton2: Kuna da lokacin tantancewa mai aiki! Kuna iya farawa da wannan asusun ta latsa **{0} Auth With Session**
ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description: Idan kuna son canza asusu, zaku iya amfani da [wannan hanyar haɗin yanar gizon]({0}) sannan kawai shigar da lambar izini bayan dannawa. maɓallin **{1} Tabbatarwa**.
ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description.nosess: **Ba ku karɓi yarjejeniyar mai amfani akan bayanan martaba ba {0}**
ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description.active: Amfani da waɗannan fasalulluka na STW na yau da kullun (Tsarin Na'urar, Saituna, Profile, da sauransu) ana sarrafa su ta ƙarin ƙarin sharuɗɗan masu zuwa:
ha.devauth.embed.legal.title: 1. Yarjejeniyar amfani
ha.devauth.embed.legal.description: Ta yin amfani da waɗannan fasalulluka, kuna nuna yarjejeniya ga tushen yarjejeniyar STW Daily, akwai a: {0}. Hakanan kun yarda da waɗannan sharuɗɗan da aka zayyana a cikin wannan yarjejeniya.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement2: Samun damar ku zuwa waɗannan fasalulluka yana kasancewa azaman lasisi wanda za'a iya soke shi a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili. Ƙungiyar STW Daily Dev Team tana da haƙƙin soke damar ku a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement4: Kuna da alhakin duk asusu(s) da ke da alaƙa da wannan sabis ɗin, da duk wani abu da zai iya faruwa gare su. Kai ne ke da alhakin yin aikinka don kiyaye amintattun asusunku, da aminci; KAR KA YI AMFANI DA ACCOUNT (S) WANDA BA KA SAMU HANYAR Imel (sai dai idan ba ka fahimci abin da kake yi ba), a matsayin 'password rest' ana iya kunnawa akan asusu da aka haɗa.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement5: Kuna ɗaukar duk wani alhaki a cikin amfani da STW Daily. Ƙungiyar Daily ta STW ƙila ba za a ɗauki alhakin kowane sakamako mara kyau ba.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement7: Ƙungiyoyin Daily STW suna ƙoƙarin kiyaye asusunku a matsayin mai tsaro kamar yadda zai yiwu, yayin da yake kasancewa a bayyane kuma bude tushen. Muna adana wasu ƙayyadaddun bayanai waɗanda ke da alaƙa da asusun Discord ɗin ku akan bayanan MongoDB Atlas wanda aka shirya a Amurka. STW Daily kanta ana gudanar da ita akan sabar AWS a Amurka. Ana adana bayanan asusun ku amintacce azaman rufaffen bayanan AES wanda kawai ɓangare na STW Daily Team ke samun dama ga.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement9: STW Daily zai tattara da adana taƙaitaccen bayanan da ke da alaƙa da asusun Discord ɗin ku, don adana bayanan tantance asusun na dogon lokaci, da kuma samar muku da gogewa mai kyau duka biyu yanzu. , kuma a nan gaba. Kuna iya duba Manufar Sirrin mu anan: {0}
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement10: Duk lokacin da kuka yi ƙoƙarin tantancewa ba tare da wani zama mai aiki ba, zaku iya tantancewa ta atomatik tare da asusun da ke da alaƙa da wannan bayanan.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement11: Idan kana son cire wannan hanyar, danna maballin {0} **Cire hanyar haɗi**
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement12: Don sake tabbatarwa da wannan asusu, danna maɓallin {0} **Sake Tabbatarwa Yanzu**
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement13: Don kunna auto. -da'awar duk asusun ku, danna maballin {0} **Ku kunna da'awar atomatik**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description1: Don musaki da'awar duk asusunku, danna maballin {0} **Kashe Da'awar atomatik**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description3: *An yi nasarar yin da'awar kai tsaye*
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description5: Ƙirƙiri zaman tantancewa wanda zai sa ku shiga na dogon lokaci
ha.devauth.embed.existing.processed.success: Wannan umarnin yana ba ku damar adana zaman tantancewar ku don kiyaye ku cikin dogon lokaci. Da zarar kun saita wannan umarni, ba za ku ƙara buƙatar samar da lambar auth ɗin ku ba.
Kar ku yi amfani da wannan umarni sai dai idan kuna da damar shiga imel ɗin asusunku, saboda ana iya kunna kalmar sirri ta sake saiti.
ha.devauth.slash.name: Bayan kun saita ingantaccen na'urar, zaku iya amfani da wannan umarni don shiga cikin lokacin gwaji ta atomatik. Wannan zai ɗauki ladan ku na STW ta atomatik kowace rana. Kuna iya fita daga wannan a kowane lokaci.
ha.devauth.meta.description2: Ƙirƙiri sabon bayanin martaba ta amfani da 'Sabuwar Bayanan' Maɓallin! Umarnin saitin da aka fara ***

ha.settings.config.upcomingdisplaydays.moda: Wannan shine harshen da za a yi amfani da shi don STW Daily akan wannan bayanin martaba. Auto yana ƙoƙarin ƙayyade harshen ku ta atomatik. Idan kuna son taimakawa fassara STW Daily, da fatan za a shiga sabar tallafi kuma ku tambayi 🥰.
Shigar da sabon harshe don amfani da shi a nan
ha.settings.config.upcomingdisplaydays.requ: Dole ne ya zama sunan harshe mai goyan bayan lambar/lambar

ha.util.processing.title: Vietnamese
ha.lang.af: Anyi amfani da shi don daidaita jarumai da masu karewa. Ana iya samuwa a cikin llamas da ta jarumai ko masu kare baya.
ha.lang.sr: Yi da'awar llama kyauta na kyauta a cikin Loot tab.
ha.lang.pa: Tsare-tsare na Makami da ba kasafai ba
ha.lang.ha: Abubuwan da ake amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa.
ha.lang.sk: Bindiga: Musamman. Yana ƙaddamar da ƙwanƙolin wuta waɗanda ke billa bangon bango, kuma za su yi baya da lalata maƙiya a cikin ƙaramin radius lokacin da suka fashe.
ha.stw.item.HeroXP.name: Jarumin Almara
ha.stw.item.Voucher_BasicPack.name.plural: Yana Juyawa zuwa Tikitin X-Ray ga kowa da kowa, da kuma V-Bucks idan kuna da asusun Kafa.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_R.name: Kuɗin da aka samu ta hanyar kammala Buƙatun yau da kullun, Tsaron Garkuwar guguwa, da wasu Faɗakarwar Ofishin Jakadancin. An yi ciniki don X-Ray Llamas a cikin Shagon Llama.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Ranged_R.name: Yana Juyawa zuwa Tikitin X-Ray ga kowa da kowa, da kuma V-Bucks idan kuna da asusun Masu Kafa.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Melee_R.name: Mai tsira bazuwar gubar.
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T01.name.plural: Kunna haɓakar XP don samun maki haɓakar Asusu XP. Ƙarfafa maki sami {0} ƙarin ƙwarewa don kanku, da kuma ba da kyauta {0} ga duk sauran 'yan wasa a ƙungiyar ku! Idan kai mai kafa ne, zaka ba da kyautar 5% ta atomatik ga duk abokan aikin ku. Yawancin 'yan wasan da ke amfani da XP Boosts, mafi girman kari ga kowa!
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Trap_R.name: Kuɗi na musamman da aka samu ta hanyar kammala ayyuka da buɗe mini llamas. Ana iya siyar da kayayyaki don abubuwa a cikin Shagon Taron.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Defender_R.name: Haɓaka Llamas
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Defender_R.desc: Tsohuwar amintaccen llama, cike da abubuwa iri-iri da haɓaka kayan haɓaka. Ya ƙunshi aƙalla abubuwa 4, gami da wani abu da ba kasafai ba ko jarumi! Yana da babban damar haɓakawa.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_VR.name: Walƙiya a cikin kwalbar
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_VR.desc: Abubuwan da ake amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa. An samo shi da farko a cikin Plankerton.
ha.stw.item.Currency_MtxSwap.name: Gwarzon Jarumi
ha.stw.item.Currency_XRayLlama.name: Idon Guguwa
ha.stw.item.Currency_XRayLlama.desc: Abubuwan da ake amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa. An samo shi da farko a cikin Canny Valley.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Manager_R.name: Kunna Ƙarfafa Ƙwararrun Abokin Ƙungiya don baiwa abokin aikin Abokin Ƙirar Ƙarfafa Mahimmanci. Ƙarfafa maki sami {0} ƙarin gogewa ga abokin wasan, haka kuma yana ba ku kyauta {1} da sauran 'yan wasa a ƙungiyar ku! Yawancin 'yan wasan da ke amfani da XP Boosts, mafi girman kari ga kowa!
ha.stw.item.SmallXpBoost.desc: Fakitin taron na musamman! Yana ba da garantin Babban Makamin Epic wanda ya kafa guda ɗaya tare da madaidaicin matakin 5.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Worker_VR.name: Shard Storm
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Worker_VR.desc: Abubuwan da ake amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa. An samo asali a cikin Twine Peaks.
ha.stw.item.EventCurrency_Scaling.name: Yana ba da tallafi na dabara ga ƙungiyar.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Bronze.name.singular: Ba tare da tsammani ba ya shiga cikin sojojin abokan gaba kafin ya halaka kansa.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Bronze.desc: Yana gobara ɓangarorin sihiri masu ƙarancin tsada.
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T02.name: Spry
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T02.desc: Tattara zinariya don siyan kaya da ayyuka.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_SR.name: Zinariya
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T03.name: Guduma
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T03.desc: Ana amfani dashi don siyan kaya masu mahimmanci.
ha.stw.item.SmallXpBoost_Gift.name.plural: Sinadari. Alamar gama gari da ake amfani da ita don haɓaka sulke. Ana iya samuwa a matakin Burny Minne kusa da Ƙunƙarar Ƙunƙara.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Worker_SR.name: Sinadarin. Rare tama da aka yi amfani da su don ƙirƙirar makamai da sulke. Ana iya samuwa a cikin Burny Minne kuma ana samun lokaci-lokaci a cikin Kasuwa.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Event_Founders.name: Sinadarin. Ma'adanin gama gari da ake amfani da su don haɓaka makamai. Ana iya samuwa a matakin Burny Minne kusa da Ƙunƙarar Ƙunƙara.
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T04.name: Yana lumshe ido da sauri kusa da wasu kristal na fasaha har sai ya ɗan ɗanɗana da'ira. Ana iya amfani da su don ɗaukar jarumai na gama-gari da na yau da kullun.
ha.wex.item.CD_Cleric_VR2_Dark_TerraRifle_T: Hanyoyin Jarumi. Taswirar taswirar sihiri wanda zai iya kaiwa ga jarumta da aka kama. An yi amfani da shi don buɗe tambayoyin Skybreaker don jarumai na farko.
ha.wex.item.CD_Pet_UC1_Painguin_Water_T03.d: Hanyoyin Jarumi. Taswirar taswirar sihiri wanda zai iya kaiwa ga gwarzon da ya kama. An yi amfani da shi don buɗe tambayoyin Skybreaker don Super Rare Heroes.
ha.wex.item.CD_Pet_VR2_Spry_Light_T04.desc: Sinadari. An yi amfani da shi don ƙirƙirar jarumai na musamman. An samo asali a cikin Shagon Asirin.
ha.wex.item.CD_Pet_VR2_Spry_Light_T04.name: Makamin Biki
ha.wex.item.Gold.desc: Sinadari. An yi amfani da shi don ƙirƙirar jarumai na musamman. An samo asali ta hanyar kammala Dungeons Event.
ha.wex.item.Gold.name: Garkuwar Biki
ha.wex.item.Hammer.desc: Sinadari. An yi amfani da shi don ƙirƙirar jarumai na musamman. An samo asali ta hanyar kammala Kalubale na mako-mako.
ha.wex.item.Hammer.name: Takobin Biki
ha.wex.item.MtxGiveaway.desc: Sinadari. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.MtxGiveaway.name: Muhimman Duhu
ha.wex.item.Ore_Iron.desc: Sinadari. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.Ore_Iron.name: Asalin Wuta
ha.wex.item.Ore_Magicite.desc: Sinadarin. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.Ore_Magicite.name: Mahimman Haske
ha.wex.item.Ore_Silver.desc: Sinadari. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.Ore_Silver.name: Asalin Halitta
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Bronze.desc: Sinadari. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Bronze.name: Asalin Ruwa
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Elemental.desc: Sinadarin. An yi amfani da shi don Supercharge jarumai. An samo asali ta hanyar siyar da jaruman Super Rare.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Elemental.name: Sirrin Goo
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_SuperRare.desc: Sinadari. Da farko ana amfani dashi don haɓakawa da haɓaka jarumai. An samo shi a cikin digo a ko'ina cikin duniya.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_SuperRare.name: Tushen wutar lantarki
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialArmor.de: Kuɗi. Ana iya amfani da shi don haɓaka matakin iyawa na musamman na kowane jarumi. An samo shi da farko a cikin akwatunan kyauta na aboki.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialShield.d: Maɓallin Kurkuku. An yi amfani da shi don buɗe matakan musamman. Ana samuwa da farko a cikin Gwaji da kuma cikin Kasuwa. Matakan da aka kulle ba su da hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'i na gamawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialSword.de: Maɓallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Hamada mai ban sha'awa. Arziki yana da yawa a cikin wannan ɓangarorin ɓalle! Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialSword.na: An binne shi a Taswirar Hamada
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.desc: Maɓallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar isa ga Planet's Core. An taba tunanin shigarta kogon al'ajabi ce. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.name: Babban Taswirar Taswirar Duniya
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.desc: Maɓallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga dajin Ƙarƙashin Ruwa. Wannan dazuzzukan da ke nutsewa na iya ɗaukar asirai da abubuwan ban mamaki da yawa. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.name: Taswirar Dajin Ƙarƙashin Ruwa
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Light.desc: Maɓallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Ramin Ƙarƙashin Ruwa. Tatsuniyoyi sun ce an kafa wannan rami ta hanyar mage mai ƙarfi. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Light.name: Taswirar Ramin Ƙarƙashin Ruwa
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Nature.desc: Maɓallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga kwarin Waterfall. An san shi duka don kyawun kyawunsa, da waɗanda suka ɓace don neman asirinta. Babu hukunce-hukuncen gazawa, ko juzu'i na kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Nature.name: Taswirar Ruwa na Asirin
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Water.desc: Yana ba da girma, haɓaka mai dindindin zuwa matsakaicin HP.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Water.name: Babban Elixir Lafiya
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_MysteryGoo.desc: Yana ba da ƙaramin ƙarami, haɓakawa na dindindin zuwa matsakaicin HP.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_MysteryGoo.name: Ƙananan Lafiya Elixir
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_T02.desc: Yana ba da haɓaka na dindindin ga mana.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_T02.name: Mana Elixir
ha.wex.item.SkillXP.desc: Yana ba da ƙaƙƙarfan haɓakawa na dindindin zuwa matsakaicin ATK.
ha.wex.item.SkillXP.name: Babban Ƙarfin Elixir
ha.wex.item.TM_MapResource.desc: Yana ba da ƙaramin ƙarami, haɓakawa na dindindin zuwa ATK.
ha.wex.item.TM_MapResource.name: Ƙarfin Ƙarfi Elixir
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.desc: Ƙirji na Sihiri cike da ganima! Bude shi a cikin menu na Chests.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.name: Magic Chest
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don wani babban jarumi!
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.name: Jarumin Jarumi Crystal
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterForest.des: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don mafi ƙarancin jarumi ko mafi kyawun gwarzo! Damar samun daga yin amfani da Crystal Hero Crystals ko buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterTunnel.des: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan gwarzon da ba kasafai ba ko mafi kyawu! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan jarumar da ba kasafai ba ko mafi kyawu! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.name: Jarumin Wuta Crystal
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan jarumar da ba kasafai ba ko mafi kyawu! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.name: Hasken Jarumi Crystal
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMinor.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan jarumar da ba kasafai ba ko mafi kyawu! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMinor.name: Jarumin Halitta Crystal
ha.wex.item.UpgradeMana.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin shagon don siyan gwarzon da ba kasafai ba ko mafi kyawu! Damar samu ta hanyar buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeMana.name: Jarumin Ruwa Crystal
